com.github.peterbencze.serritor.api

Class CrawlRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.peterbencze.serritor.api.CrawlRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class CrawlRequest
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Represents a crawl request that may be completed by the crawler in the future. If request filtering is enabled, it could be filtered out.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
